title: Establish Settlement
description: You draw up plans, gather resources, entice citizens, and establish boundaries to found a brand new settlement in the hex. Attempt a basic Engineering, Industry, Politics, or Scholarship check. If you cannot pay the RP required by the result of this check, treat your result as a critical failure. A settlement always starts as a village.
requirement: The hex in which you’re establishing the settlement has been Cleared and doesn’t currently have a settlement (including a Freehold) in it.

criticalSuccess.msg: You establish the settlement largely with the aid of enthusiastic volunteers. @lose1d6ResourcePoints

failure.msg: You establish the settlement, but inefficiently and at great expense. @lose6d6ResourcePoints

criticalFailure.msg: You fail to establish the settlement.
